alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:40AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Susquehanna, northwestern Luzerne, southeastern Bradford and western Wyoming Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 540 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Ricketts Glen State Park, or 18 miles southwest of Wyalusing, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Muhlenberg, Nanticoke, Lehman, Harveys Lake, West Franklin, Wilmot, Hollenback, Noxen, Mehoopany and Wyalusing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
